title: What is Kiki Challenge?
article_body: is a dance challenge that has gone viral across the world. The is based on Canadian hip-hop superstar Drake’s hit song "In My Feelings" from his latest album Scorpion. The viral trend shows participants coming out of a moving car, leaving the door open and then dance to the song beside their slow-moving vehicle as it cruises down the street. The US comedian Shoker is believed to be the inventor of this dance challenge. Shoker on his Instagram post (@theshiggyshow), posted a video of him performing for the "In My Feelings" song. The song also plays off the chorus: Kiki, do you love me/ Are you riding/ Say you’ll never ever leave from beside me. As per the challenge, the participant has to step out of a moving car, perform the dance while the car is moving and then again jump back into the car, without any injuries. However, a series of casualties have been reported in Delhi, Mumbai, Chandigarh, Bengaluru, UP, Jaipur and other cities because of Kiki challenge. In India, the enforcement agencies have issued advisories against attempting the challenge.
